topic.title: Change start page
topic.body: How can I configure zeronet to change the start page address so I get anythin other than hello zero?

1_1HADrnDdgCKmF1pK79SDU8bakqURnmfKe8.body: I did it. Either start with --homepage=1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT as a command line argument or use homepage = 1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT in the config file. Should have been in the README.md of the git repo or something.
